name: The Little Tower
description:
This is my game, tower defense / clicker / indie.

I've been developing alone for 5 days now counting 12/23/2021. Hope you like it, if you want to support I would be totally grateful for a donation.

Remembering that this is an alpha version. this found a lot of bugs, but I'm counting on you to report them here. and I am also open to suggestions.

Som da espada: Joel Azzopardi
